column1: Visit https://t.co/XLDdRQKf5Y to learn about the importance of participating in this year's Census. #AZ01 https://t.co/gC60Kg6ok3
#AZ01: Every two seconds someone in the U.S. needs blood. I urge you to consider donating or volunteering at your local blood donation center. https://t.co/IpmyXReKEB

Nine years ago today a gunman opened fire at Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords' Congress on Your Corner event in Tucson wounding her and 13 others and taking six innocent lives. Today we mourn those lost and keep their loved ones present in our thoughts. #AZ01 https://t.co/l013637uVN
Social Security and Medicare are programs #AZ01 seniors have paid into their entire lives; we must ensure they are protected for generations to come. RT if you agree. https://t.co/a1KcXGwy91

Relieved to see #AZ01 park rangers and fellow hikers helped to locate Mr. O'Connor yesterday. @GrandCanyonNPS rangers are urging visitors to employ safe hiking practices and to be mindful of more difficult trails.  https://t.co/SG4nLgmPfk
Stay safe on the roads tonight #AZ01! Take advantage of free transportation options in your area. https://t.co/DLivJ3E1Nn

Beyond pleased that the new section of AZ Loop 202 will be renamed for former Congressman Ed Pastor first Latino representative from Arizona. He fought tirelessly to improve Arizona infrastructure and the lives of his constituents. #AZ01 https://t.co/i5YkcMf6T2

Recently I re-introduced the Nursing Home Care for Native American Veterans Act. Veterans in #AZ01 tribal communities should not have to travel hundreds of miles to receive the care they were promised. RT if you agree. https://t.co/0XoUJ3GS1k

Over the past two years I’ve had the unique opportunity to represent #AZ01 & give rural Arizona a voice in Washington. It has been the greatest honor. I look forward to continue fighting for Arizonans and I invite you to join #TeamOHalleran. Chip in: https://t.co/iTFjIFUA7K
ANNOUNCEMENT: I am running! I am excited to announce that I will be running for re-election in 2020 to represent #AZ01 in the United States House of Representatives.
